item.title: How do you make npc's where u want and sell what u want
item.dc:creator: @mehaku mehaku
item.description:
@mehaku wrote:

nope… first you add the npc to autospawn, then you add the shop and its features to shops.cfg then you go into client.java and search for wanneshop and add something like this in there:

} else if (NPCID == NPCID!!) { //Refrence Title here PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 40;
and then you should be set, if you need nemore help add illhakyou@hotmail.com to msn messanger and ill give u a walkthrough or do it for u whateva u want

Read full topic
